At first, I thought it was just my subconscious trying to tell me something, but now I'm starting to think it's more than that.

These dreams started after I finally broke free from our toxic relationship. I'd spent months rebuilding myself, rediscovering old hobbies, and learning to love again. I guess what I'm saying is that I feel like I'm running out of options. I've tried everything to shake off this feeling, but it only gets stronger.
